titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to exempt certain adopted children, and certain children coming to the United States for adoption, from the requirement to present documentation of vaccination against vaccine-preventable diseases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 9/8/1997--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to exempt certain adopted children, and certain children seeking an immediate relative (as adopted children) immigrant visa, from the vaccination requirement.
